Articles.Content:
Hey there,

I really love the game. It's the game I always wanted.

I have a suggestion, though:

Please, please redesign the UI.

It is just horrible at the moment.

The gradient gray & black is really old-school and doesn't look very good. Modals & windows with that background look very bad in my opinion.

The title menu is awesome, though.

Thanks!

Master

Good news, redesigned ui is coming within the next 2-3 updates !

It isn't being talked about much though so we don't know the progress nor exactly how soon it might come...
